mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WH_DSP_WORK_INFO ( OBJ_ID ,REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,DSP_WORK_ID ,EQP_ID ,PORT_ID ,LOT_ID ,TRACK_IN_CNFM_YN ,EQP_CHK_YN ,RCP_CHK_YN ,RCP_ID ,DSP_STAT_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID ) SELECT (SELECT TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF6') || '-' || SYS_GUID() FROM DUAL) AS OBJ_ID ,OBJ_ID AS REF_OBJ_ID ,SITE_ID ,DSP_WORK_ID ,EQP_ID ,PORT_ID ,LOT_ID ,TRACK_IN_CNFM_YN ,EQP_CHK_YN ,RCP_CHK_YN ,RCP_ID ,DSP_STAT_CD ,EVNT_NM ,PREV_EVNT_NM ,CSTM_EVNT_NM ,PREV_CSTM_EVNT_NM ,USE_STAT_CD ,RSN_CD ,TRNS_CM ,CRT_USER_ID ,CRT_DT ,MDFY_USER_ID ,MDFY_DT ,FNL_EVNT_DT ,TID FROM WN_DSP_WORK_INFO WHERE OBJ_ID = #{objId}
